GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v4.9.304
GSD.description:
iio: adc: men_z188_adc: Fix a resource leak in an error handling path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.304 by commit 0f88722313645a903f4d420ba61ddc690ec2481d, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 74aeac4da66fbfa246edbfc849002eac9b5af9ca. For more details please see the references link.
